fever.advice: Take paracetamol, stay hydrated, and rest.

cold.advice: Drink warm fluids, rest, and avoid cold exposure.

cough.advice: Use cough syrup and avoid dust. Stay hydrated.

headache.advice: Take rest in a quiet place. Use pain relievers if necessary.

stomachache.advice: Avoid heavy meals. Try antacids and drink water.

nausea.advice: Rest and take anti-nausea meds if available.

vomiting.advice: Rehydrate with ORS. Avoid solid food initially.

bodyache.advice: Take mild painkillers and rest. Stay hydrated.

diarrhoea.advice: Drink plenty of fluids. Use ORS. Maintain hygiene.
